review: Tamamen etkileşimli bir Sanal Gerçeklik deneyimiyle ilk tamamen elektrikli performans SUV'umuzun önizlemesi olan Jaguar I-PACE Concept'i keşfedin. HTC Vive müşterileri artık sinematikler ve sürükleyici VR teknolojisinin bir karışımı aracılığıyla I-PACE Concept'in arkasındaki tasarım ve mühendislik hikayelerini keşfedebilecekler.

review: Controls really do nothing, so you're basically looking at a car, and the graphics aren't properly representative of the final product. I get it's a concept car, but this feels like a watered down experience of a concept for a concept.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982295752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2097, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1596153918}
review:
Jaguar I-PACE Concept | Virtual Reality Experience is a free VR ad program for an expensive electric car.   It worked on my system, looked ok, played ok, sounded good.  Was an ok way to show off the car and tell about its finer points.  Could be use as something to show VR uses.

Try it, if you are car shopping. 

For more info:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lShppxoDef8

author: {'steamid': '76561197961017729', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3428, 'playtime_forever': 862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 637, 'last_played': 1709151843}
review: This is the best available VR car demo from VivePort, now on Steam. Some of the others are quite blurry and amateurish. This one's alright. [i][b]It's not as good as the Infiniti demo from months ago, because that demo had mountains, and a bird and a goat.[/b][/i] This is just one scene, but I very much liked the purple displacement mapped ground. I'm not an expert, but it seems lucky that displacement maps more or less function well in VR. You'd think they wouldn't, but they looks fine even up close. [spoiler]Did you know that the Jaguar cat is native to the Americas? I didn't, until just now![/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198085659699', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1511635041}
review: Hujowe jak barszcz to myszki nie osbługuje ani klawiatury. Ale na komende esc potrafi gre wyjebać. A w tym czymś nawet autem nie można pokierować. Huj nie gra czy program zapoznawczy a producenci niech zapomną że ja kupie jaguara jak nie wiem o nim nic. Kasa w kopercie zostaje jak narazie i co najwyżej myśle o polonezie caro za 30 tysięcy. A myślałem ooo kupie tego najnowszego jaguara, ale nie bo jakiegoś vr nie mam i nic o nim nie wiem. Nieźle sie zgadali z wynalcami czujnika głowy. -10/20.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066590240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2800, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1510624193}
review:
It's actually pretty cool to sit inside the Jaguar I-PACE and if anybody wants to gift me this car, message me.  I would be more than happy to give a glowing review for the free ride.  I'm kidding of course, my ethics in reviewing games on Steam prevent me from doing so :DDDDDDD hahahahahahaha hahahahaaha hahahahaha

However, I'm reviewing the VR experience and it's less than stellar, especially on the Oculus Rift.  The Oculus Rift is being listed as supported, however, you have to do the Windows 7 compatibility fix to get it to work properly.  Okay that's no biggie since this experience is free.  But even after you do the fix, the video stutters along.  It's really hard to enjoy the vehicle and the details put into it the I-PACE vehicle model when the video problems detract severely from it.

You honestly get a very little info on the vehicle.  You get more details just by looking at it.  The amount of details put in the car to match the real-life counterpart is amazing (e.g. you can see the stitchings on the seat!)  However, the narrated experience is very barebones.  There's no way to get more information on the car than what the guided experience gives you.  You get told to visit the Jaguar website.  Of course, it's probably advisable just to go to the Jaguar website and forget this VR title if you're really interested in this vehicle.

So it's cool to be inside the car.  But that's all you do.  The rest is point and click.  I was hoping they would at least let you feel what it's like in motion.  You don't even get that.  You want me to download your 1GB of data for an ad, at least let me feel what it's like going down the road.  I just can't recommend this experience, it's a try once and delete for the truly curious or for VR junkies.  I'd never show this off to a friend, so it's a NO recommendation.

Rating 4/10 c'mon Jaguar, let us experience this I-PACE on the road, we'd probably even pay for the pleasure!

author: {'steamid': '76561197970431718', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1510604191}
